explains: vi. 失败；发嘶嘶声；萎靡

sentences.en: Did your ebook fizzle out after a few pages?
sentences.cn: 你的电子书是不是一些页数之后终归失败？

sentences.en: Or will the idea disappointingly fizzle once again?
sentences.cn: 还是又一次以失望告终？

sentences.en: This is how relationships quickly lose its spark and fizzle out.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么那些关系很快失去掉火花然后最终失败。
